ComicInfo.Title: Otherworld
ComicInfo.Summary:
OTHEWORLD
Sunset has found the Portal of Fos and escaped the dark world of Erebos!
But what danger awaits her in the strange place she's only ever heard called "Otherworld?"
Join our mysterious young hero as she battles to uncover more of her past and answer the burning question of who she truly is and how she can protect herself from the shadowy cabal surely in pursuit!
Why is she so important?
Who was her family?
Who is good and who is evil and...
What's the difference?
Can she survive?
